title: CHAT LOCKED
body: 1. pls help me my chat dont load

replies.body:
Chat connectivity issues are often caused by an unstable connection to the chat servers. I strongly recommend you work through the most common solutions for connection problems in our [network guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if those steps resolved your chat issue.
